forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds beneath a sunny sky, inviting residents to step out and embrace the day. With temperatures gently rising to about 65 degrees, the air is crisp yet comfortable, animated by a soft west-southwest breeze. The wind's playful gusts, reaching up to 23 mph, stir the city like a refreshing breath, hinting at the vibrancy of the life that pulsates through its streets.

Looking ahead to tonight, the clouds will retreat for a nearly clear evening, settling into a cool serenity as temperatures dip to around 53 degrees. This is a time when the city takes on a softer hue, perhaps encouraging strolls along the waterfront or intimate gatherings at cozy cafes. The presence of fog is subtle today; the marine layer may linger just beyond the hills, teasing glimpses of brightness while preserving a hint of mystery. A light jacket will suffice for the day, providing warmth against the breeze without feeling burdensome. As you navigate this picturesque urban landscape, consider a leisurely walk across one of the iconic bridges or exploring the local artisanal shops — activities that marry the charm of the city with the inviting embrace of the weather, each a mundane delight turned extraordinary beneath a San Francisco sky.
